product_name: LAMO Monica Clog Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Pairing the look of a traditional clog with the plush softness of your favorite slippers, the LAMO Monica Clog shoes deliver both comfort and style. Suede leather uppers provide durable, flexible support and structure; slip-on style provides easy on/off. Plush sheepskin linings insulate while remaining breathable, ideal for cool or warm days. EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support. Thermoplastic rubber and wood outsoles provide durable support and traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Pairing the look of a traditional clog with the plush softness of your favorite slippers, the LAMO Monica Clog shoes deliver both comfort and style.
